name: Coloring ASMR: Draw Master
description:
Would you like to test your IQ, creativity, or coloring skills? Are you a genius at coloring games? Do you know how to color well in puzzle games? Are you looking for a new original entertaining game?
Now you are having a good chance for a brain test!
Let’s play Coloring ASMR: Draw Master – Experience tons of tricky puzzles featured by drawing!
This is a game combined with logical drawing games and coloring tests.
Use your brain, and color the pattern to complete missions and get stars! You can color the alphabet letter, banban, choco choco, spider, Wednesday, Megan, and flag to puzzle the task. Learn to color creatively, develop your sense of logic, and improve your brain!
Where is the limit of your IQ?

GAME FEATURES
- Mix and match: You may also use your imagination to its fullest extent and select whatever colors you like to produce the image that you find the most alluring and fascinating.
- Unleash your creative side: This is a fantastic approach to begin learning how to draw and make pictures.
- Draw and color your way to relaxation in this game whenever you're feeling stressed out.

HOW TO PLAY COLORING ASMR: DRAW MASTER
- Draw and color: Tap and hold to start drawing, then color the space to complete the picture.
- Explore various themes with special characters waiting for you.

Play online for free and enjoy your artwork today with Coloring ASMR: DRAW MASTER.
